text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text: "World's Strongest" ―an Uma Musume chasing that goal, is now here in France competing against veterans to that end!

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text: In this exceptional, extended campaign, it's no exaggeration to say that strong determination is apparent in her running!

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text: Now, they round the final corner in to the final stretch! Taking the outside, she enters the spurt!

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text: So strong! She's leaving behind last year's Prix de l'Arc de Triomphe winner, as well as this generation of Europe's representatives!

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text: An easy victory! She pulls ahead 2 lengths, 3 lengths, and crosses the goal!!

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text: Against veterans from around the world, she claims a magnificent victory in France's G1 the 『Grand Prix de Saint-Cloud』!

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text: El Condor Pasa! Once again, she's delivered a big dream to all the fans in Japan!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Bueno! Even out in the world, El is in perfect condition!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Now……the goal I've been aiming for, the 『Prix de l'Arc de Triomphe』, is already within arms reach!

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text: 『That dream of victory in the Prix de l'Arc de Triomphe, is one step closer to becoming reality!』

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text: 『Will El Condor Pasa be able to achieve this feat? The fans' expectations have probably never been higher!』

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: ……El-chan, amazing……!
The champions, Seiun Sky and Mejiro Bright were defeated in the 『Spring Tenno Sho』 by Special Week――
On this day, to show our appreciation to those girls, we were throwing a party.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Well then, we'll have today's star, Special Week, take it from here with a toast!!

text_block_list.name: Uma Musume with Bangs
text_block_list.text: Sounds good, Special Week-san!

text_block_list.name: Droopy-eyed Uma Musume
text_block_list.text: I was waiting for this~!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Ah, well, um!! The reason I was able to keep winning until now, was everyone's――

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Cheers!!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Ueeeeh!? C-cheers!!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Lately, the number of articles about Spe-chan have increased a lot, huh? Saying things like the "Golden Generation's" Derby Uma Musume isn't just a fluke!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Yeah, your 『Spring Tenno Sho』 was cool too.
She's always originally had the potential but, now she's able to display her true strength while running!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Uwaa~h! Really!? Thank you very much~!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Actually, even I've been thinking that I've changed a lot from before! Like, being able to run with confidence……!
This Spring she entered the Senior class, and Special Week's results so far have culminated in 3 consecutive wins, including this G1 win at the 『Spring Tenno Sho』.
That promising start, was the materialization of her own feelings.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: I suppose you could call it a present for Special Week-san―― but there was some wonderful news.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Wonderful news……?

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: For the upcoming 『Takarazuka Kinen』―― It seems that you're leading in fan votes, Spe.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Eh……eeeh!? I-I am!?
It's probably a lot of pressure on you but, you could say that it's proof of just how many expectations Spe's running has gathered.
It means that Spe has been pushing forward strongly enough that the fans have showed their support by voting for her.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Forward……

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Now that you mention it, compared to when you first transferred here, you've really gotten more reliable!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Eh……!? Is that how you see it!?

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: But, from now on, your races will continue! But for today, we'll eat to our hearts content, and increase our presence that way!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Presence……! I see! In that case, then I shouldn't hold back!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Alright, in the 『Takarazuka Kinen』 and eating, I'll do my best!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Um, everyone! Thank you very much for today!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: For treating me to a good meal, and getting praised by everyone, you could say that I've refreshed my spirits too――

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: I'm going to work harder than before, and continue to chase my dreams!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: I still don't know what it takes to become "Japan's #1 Uma Musume" though―

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: As a way of repaying everyone that's supported me thus far, I'll definitely take hold of my dream!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Uoooooooh~! You're so conscientious, Spe-chan! We'll keep cheering you oooon~~!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Yes, we'll become your strength whenever you need it. So show us what it means to be "Japan's #1 Uma Musume".
Special Week's contemporaries were called the "Golden Generation", so with all those champions present, getting results would by no means be easy.
In truth, she had already had several bitter experiences, however, she continued to run.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Just like when I was running today and from now on, I think "Japan's #1 Uma Musume" is probably somewhere ahead.
Looks like starting tomorrow, more special training.
Looks like starting tomorrow, more special training.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Yeah!
That big dream, "Japan's #1"――
For her dream, as a trainer, I'll have to properly renew my feelings of wanting to support her.
